thumb.title: クソカッコイイ、メロディック・デスメタル（メロデス）MV集
thumb.description: 1.Arch Enemy - Deceiver, Deceiver2.BRYMIR - Wings Of Fire3.CHILDREN OF BODOM - Trashed, Lost & Strungout4.DARK TRANQUILLITY - Misery's Crown5.Dreamshade - Your Voice6.EQUILIBRIUM - Der Ewige Sieg7.GRYMHEART - Ignis Fatuus8.INSOMNIUM - While We Sleep9.Kalmah - Seventh Swamphony10.MORS PRINCIPIUM EST - Monster In Me11.OBSCURA - The Anticosmic Overload12.Thousand Eyes - Day Of Salvation
